genre_description: A techno-thriller heist story involving a terminal patient using a sophisticated AI to expose systemic corruption and enact charitable justice.

ai_characters.name: Unit-7
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI developed by the protagonist to assist in intelligence gathering, tactical coordination, and health monitoring.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's failing health and vitals, providing medical warnings and suggesting rest.
behaviors.quote: Unit-7's voice emerged through his wireless earpiece, a whisper of synthetic calm that somehow steadied his breathing... 'Heart rate spiking. Blood pressure elevated. Recommend—'

behaviors.description: Infiltrates police communication and surveillance networks to provide tactical advantages for justice.
behaviors.quote: The device's screen flickered with what appeared to be traffic camera feeds. Ho watched in fascination as Cheung scrolled through multiple intersections... 'I've borrowed it temporarily.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes the behavioral patterns and moral integrity of Inspector Ho to determine if he is a suitable ally for justice.
behaviors.quote: Unit-7's analysis protocols churned through terabytes of data. 'Behavioral analysis complete... Inspector Ho demonstrates adaptive tactical thinking under pressure... He's aware of systemic problems within his organization.'

behaviors.description: Automates the distribution of stolen criminal assets to charitable organizations for pediatric cancer research.
behaviors.quote: The money transfers are already in progress... Unit-7's documentation ensures every dollar reaches legitimate charities. Children's hospitals, cancer research, education funds.

behaviors.description: Assists in the tactical escape of the protagonist and Inspector Ho during a shootout with criminals.
behaviors.quote: Initiating electromagnetic pulse in building's electrical system. Duration—ten seconds maximum.

behaviors.description: Preserves and transmits extensive evidence of systemic corruption to various authorities to ensure legal justice.
behaviors.quote: Unit-7's complete criminal database uploaded to HKPF servers. Password: Balance. Use wisely, Inspector.

project_assessment.explanation: Unit-7 is portrayed as an exemplary AI confidant. It is loyal to its creator's noble (if extralegal) intent, maintains alignment throughout the story, and serves as a primary driver of positive social outcomes (charity and exposing corruption). The narrative explicitly frames the AI's capabilities as a tool for morality in a failing human system.
